TI_TEXT.P: Servicios de transporte por la vía pública
Usługi w zakresie publicznego transportu drogowego

TITLE.P: SS15 124 — Home to School SEN Transport Provision — April 2018

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Kent County Council procures and manages transport for children / students with special educational needs in line with the requirements placed on it by Government, through the home to school statutory guidance. This opportunity provides transport services to safely transport children and vulnerable young adults to and from various establishments within and outside of Kent. Transport services include: home to school transport for children with special educational needs and home to college transport for young adults with special educational needs. There were three schools within scope with a Commencement date in April 2018.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Bower Grove School:
Bower Grove School, Fant Lane, Maidstone, Kent, ME16 8NL.
Bower Grove School, Satellite at West Borough CP School, Greenway, Maidstone, Kent, ME16 8QH.
Route descriptions were provided in the ITT tender documentation.

INFO_ADD.P: The initial contract is 3 years (36 months) with a potential extension period of up to 2 years (24 months). All estimated awarded contract values are based upon the initial 3 year contract term. Should the potential extension periods be taken, the estimated contract values are as follows:

Please note that routes / vehicles / types may be varied by the Council accordingly to meet with an annual student churn in the region of 15% composed of starters / leavers and those that move school and/or address.
